title: Manual Inoa of La Aurora Cigars
itunes:title: Manual Inoa of La Aurora Cigars
description:
This week on the internet’s number 1 cigar podcast we welcome to the show Manuel Inoa of La Aurora cigars where he serves as the Master Blender. 

In the first hour we will light up the La Aurora Untamed Extreme with the CLE Chele following in the second hour. 

Join us for all the madness known as The Cigar Authority
